fda_announcement: The FDA is aware of emerging supply challenges in the market and is actively monitoring the situation. We encourage manufacturers and stakeholders to report any disruptions and collaborate to ensure continued supply.
The FDA is aware of an emerging drug shortage and encourages manufacturers to report any supply disruptions. We are working with stakeholders to coordinate efforts to mitigate the impact.

The FDA is aware of an emerging shortage in the market. We encourage manufacturers to report any disruptions and coordinate with the FDA to address supply issues. Stakeholders are advised to manage inventory responsibly.
